reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Global education and development communications

description.narrative: Demo Finland?s global education contributes to Finnish debate on development policy and offers personal opportunities for member party politicians to participate in democracy support. This helps Demo Finland to fulfill its vision and mission and in general , contributes to achievement of Finnish development policy goals. The participation of Finnish parties and politicians is Demo Finland?s key resource in offering peer-support to parties in partner countries. Immediate results include the politicians? incre ased knowledge on developmental affairs and there is informed debate on them. There is also an increasing number of Finnish politicians who have a personal attachment to Finnish developmen cooperation. Direct beneficiaries are partner country politicians w ho benefit from the Finnish peer-support and Finnish politicians who have increased knowledge on developmental issues. Indirect beneficiaries are the citizens of partner countries. Demo Finland implements global education and communications with its partne r organisations in project countries.
